summary.span: 顯示用於 控制項中的核取方塊使用者介面 (UI)。

span.span: Displays a check box user interface (UI) to use in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是特殊的類型的用來顯示二進位或三元透過核取方塊 UI 呈現的資訊。The class is a specialized type of used to display binary or ternary information presented through a check box UI. 在預設二進位模式中，資料格可以保存的值`true`或`false`。In the default binary mode, the cells can hold values of `true` or `false`. 在三元模式中，資料格採取的其中一個值。In ternary mode, the cells take on one of the values. 屬性可讓您判斷二進位或三元模式是否作用中。The property determines whether binary or ternary mode is in effect. 專門保留此類型的儲存格的資料行類型。The is the column type specialized to hold cells of this type. 根據預設，會初始化為新。By default, the is initialized to a new . 若要模式後將現有的資料行內的資料格，設定的資料行作為 [模式] 儲存格的屬性。To pattern the cells within a column after an existing , set the column's property to the cell to use as a pattern. 資料行的資料格相關屬性會包裝函式樣板的儲存格的名稱類似的屬性。The cell-related properties of the column are wrappers for the similarly-named properties of the template cell. 變更範本的儲存格的屬性值會影響只儲存格以範本為基礎，在變更後會加入。Changing the property values of the template cell will affect only cells based on the template that are added after the change. 變更資料行的資料格相關的屬性值，不過，將更新範本的儲存格和資料行中的所有資料格，如有必要，請重新整理資料行顯示。Changing the cell-related property values of the column, however, will update the template cell and all other cells in the column, and refresh the column display if necessary. 目前的儲存格時，則屬性一律會是`true`。When the current cell is a , the property is always `true`. 一般而言，核取方塊儲存格的值是針對儲存體，就像任何其他資料，或針對執行大量作業。Typically, check box cell values are intended either for storage, like any other data, or for performing bulk operations. 如果您想要回應立即當使用者按一下核取方塊儲存格，您可以處理事件，但是這個事件發生才會更新資料格的值。If you want to respond immediately when users click a check box cell, you can handle the event, but this event occurs before the cell value is updated. 如果您在按一下時需要新的值，其中一個選項是計算預期的值將會根據目前的值。If you need the new value at the time of the click, one option is to calculate what the expected value will be based on the current value. 另一個方法是立即認可變更，並處理回應事件。Another approach is to commit the change immediately, and handle the event to respond to it. 若要認可變更，按一下儲存格時，您必須處理事件。To commit the change when the cell is clicked, you must handle the event. 在處理常式中，核取方塊儲存格的目前儲存格時，呼叫方法並傳入值。In the handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the method and pass in the value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用追蹤哪些員工名字是在辦公室。The following code example uses a to track which employees are in the office. 資料行組成的物件。The column is made up of objects. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#20)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項會呼叫這個方法，以將資料格的值轉換為相等的顯示值所表示的型別屬性。The control calls this method to convert a cell value into an equivalent display value of the type indicated by the property. 控制項將儲存格的值傳遞給這個方法在`value`參數。The control passes the cell value to this method in the `value` parameter. 這個方法會先嘗試將`value`要或值使用， ，和如果已設定的屬性。This method first attempts to convert `value` to a or value using the , , and properties if they have been set. 如果轉換成功，就會發生事件。If the conversion is unsuccessful, the event occurs. 如果沒有此事件或處理常式集沒有處理常式屬性設`true`，會擲回例外狀況。If there is no handler for this event or the handler sets the property to `true`, an exception is thrown. 如果轉換成功或沒有處理常式事件，並且不會設定屬性設`true`，則就會發生事件。If the conversion is successful or there is a handler for the event and it does not set the property to `true`, the event occurs. A事件處理常式可以修改`value`和`cellStyle`。A event handler can modify both `value` and `cellStyle`. 如果處理常式不會設定屬性，以`true`，不過，這個方法會格式化`value`使用的格式化屬性`cellStyle`物件。If the handler does not set the property to `true`, however, this method formats `value` using the formatting properties of the `cellStyle` object. 這會導致額外事件。This can result in an additional event. 如果格式設定成功，`context`參數的值會包含值，這個方法會傳回格式化的值複製到剪貼簿的版本。If formatting is successful and the `context` parameter value includes the value, this method returns the version of the formatted value for copying to the Clipboard. 否則，這個方法會傳回格式化的值，以顯示在控制項。Otherwise, this method returns the formatted value for display in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 三元模式中的第三個狀態通常表示未初始化或不定值。The third state in ternary mode typically represents an uninitialized or indeterminate value. 設定主控資料行的屬性也會設定屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 設定資料行值之後，若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定儲存格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. 不同於資料行屬性中，儲存格屬性不會自動更新屬性的相關聯的儲存格樣式，當您變更其值。Unlike the column property, the cell property does not automatically update the property of the associated cell style when you change its value. 當您變更儲存格屬性值，以`true`，請務必設定屬性所傳回的物件屬性設。When you change the cell property value to `true`, be sure to set the property of the object returned by the property to . 當您變更屬性值，以`false`，請務必設定屬性設`false`。When you change the property value to `false`, be sure to set the property to `false`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用追蹤 office 光源的狀態。The following code example uses a to track the status of office lighting. 屬性"turnedOff 」 將與相關聯`false`，則屬性關聯"turnedOn 」 `true`，和屬性產生關聯的 「 未知 」 以不定。The property associates "turnedOff" with `false`, the property associates "turnedOn" with `true`, and the property associates "unknown" to indeterminate.
